titleStmt.title: About the Project
דֶער אֱמֶת׳ר יוּ - The Geniune Jew

body.p:
The Geniuine Jew is a Newspaper that was published from February to November 1904 in Lviv, at that time part of Poland, now in the Ukraine. The aim of this project is to translate that paper, give more context about the people and places mentioned, and make this source more accessible to those who do not understand the Yiddish language.
The text is structured in paragraphs as seen in the facsimile - not line per line as the syntax of English and the syntax of Yiddish differs greatly. Highlighted people and places are indexed.
